events.title: Ogopogoâ€™s Wake
events.summary: Ogopogo's wake hummed across the lakefront.

stages.text: Kelowna Lake shivers as Ogopogo's wake hums along the rocks.

choices.label: Leave smoked salmon
choices.outcome: You scatter smoked salmon along the slick stones.

effects.label: Calm waters soften upcoming hazards.
effects.message: Calm waters rolled ahead for the next legs.
Left smoked salmon for Ogopogo and the lake fell quiet.

choices.label: Search the shore
choices.outcome: You follow the glow, sketching the wake's paths.

effects.message: Ogopogo traced gentle coves around the lake.
Mapped Ogopogo's calm coves around the lake.

choices.label: Let the song pull you
choices.outcome: You ease off the pedals and let the wake tow the van.

effects.message: Ogopogo towed you ahead overnight.
Ogopogo's wake ferried the van forward overnight.

stages.text: Mist lingers as the wake circles back, inviting a parting gesture.

choices.label: Cup the lake water
choices.outcome: You share the chill with the crew.

effects.message: Ogopogo's gift steadied the crew for the next push.

choices.label: Chart the ripples
choices.outcome: You mark the ripples into a neat pencil map.

effects.label: Lake sense sharpened the next preview.
effects.message: Lake sense sharpened the next preview.
Ogopogo's ripples sharpened the family's map sense.

events.title: Wendigo Radio
events.summary: A wendigo broadcast whispered through the static.

stages.text: A rusted cabin radio hums on the dash with a hungry wendigo voice.

choices.label: Tune carefully
choices.outcome: You feather the dial until the howl steadies.

effects.message: The signal flagged calmer side roads.
Tuned the wendigo radio and logged the safer spurs.

choices.label: Overdrive the dial
choices.outcome: You crank the dial past sane limits.

effects.label: Radio deal shaved a liter off each jump.
effects.message: The broadcast bartered a little gas off each jump.
Overdrove the wendigo radio and scored a gas discount.

choices.label: Ignore it
choices.outcome: You close the glove box on the hiss.

effects.message: Ignored the wendigo broadcast and kept the cabin quiet.

stages.text: The final burst scratches coordinates across the windshield frost.

choices.label: Pin the signal
choices.outcome: You jot the numbers onto the paper atlas.

effects.message: The note revealed a gentle side route.
Pinned the wendigo marker onto the atlas for a softer detour.

choices.label: Let it fade
choices.outcome: You let the phantom signal slip away.

effects.message: Let the wendigo broadcast fade back into the static.

events.title: Hotel Beneath the Snow
events.summary: A buried hotel opened its glowing foyer.

stages.text: A hotel sunk beneath snowdrifts swings open with warm light.

choices.label: Take the beds
choices.outcome: Everyone collapses into quilted bunks.

effects.message: Rested under snowbank quilts and patched up the ride.

choices.label: Check the boiler
choices.outcome: You coax the roaring boiler back into rhythm.

effects.message: Tuned the buried boiler and tightened the chassis.

choices.label: Wander the hall
choices.outcome: You follow endless hallways of framed voyageurs.

effects.message: Wandered the ghostly halls beneath the snow.

success.outcome: A freight elevator drops you near the next town.

effects.message: The hotel elevator lifted you ahead underground.
A hidden elevator jumped the van ahead under the drifts.

failure.outcome: You loop back to the lobby before dawn.

effects.message: Lost in the snowbound halls before finding the lobby again.

stages.text: A frozen clerk slides the guest ledger across the counter.

choices.label: Sign the ledger
choices.outcome: You sign with mittened hands.

effects.message: Signed the buried ledger and pocketed a refund.

choices.label: Slip the clerk cash
choices.outcome: You slide a few crisp bills across the desk.

effects.message: The clerk highlighted the safest exits.
Paid the snowbound clerk for directions to safer routes.

events.title: Voyageursâ€™ Ghost Canoe
events.summary: A glowing canoe paced the headlights.

stages.text: A ghostly canoe glides alongside, paddlers chanting in French.

choices.label: Pay the toll
choices.outcome: You toss maple sugar toward the bow.

effects.label: Voyageurs will block the next hazard.
effects.message: The paddlers promised to block the next hazard.
Paid the voyageur spirits to block the next hazard.

choices.label: Match their pace
choices.outcome: You paddle the wheel in time with their strokes.

effects.message: Kept pace with the voyageur canoe and boosted morale.

choices.label: Peer into the canoe
choices.outcome: You lean over to study the shimmering hull.

effects.message: You slept a year in a blink.
Peered into the ghost canoe and lost a day to dreamless sleep.

stages.text: The paddlers beckon you to join their chant.

choices.label: Lead the refrain
choices.outcome: You echo their haunting refrain.

effects.label: Voyageur chant softened upcoming hazards.
effects.message: The chant softened the next hazard.
Led the voyageurs' chant and eased the next hazard.

choices.label: Listen for the route
choices.outcome: You let their harmonies map the bends ahead.

effects.message: The chant revealed which bends stay calm.
Listened to the voyageurs and marked the safest bends ahead.

events.title: Aurora Tollkeeper
events.summary: An aurora-lit tollkeeper flagged the headlights.

stages.text: An aurora tollkeeper leans into the roadway, palm outstretched.

choices.label: Pay the toll
choices.outcome: You pass a thermos of cocoa and a crumpled twenty.

effects.label: Aurora blessing steadies hazards for a while.
effects.message: Aurora blessing steadies hazards for a while.
Paid the aurora tollkeeper and earned a smoother road.

choices.label: Argue the rates
choices.outcome: You haggle while the lights shimmer overhead.

effects.message: The tollkeeper pointed toward gentler exits.
Argued with the aurora tollkeeper and traded snacks for safer turns.

choices.label: Drive through
choices.outcome: You edge past the spectral booth without stopping.

effects.message: Shouldered past the aurora tollkeeper and took a hit to the ride.

success.outcome: Aurora sparks cling to the bumper in protection.

effects.label: Aurora sparks cling to the chassis.
effects.message: Aurora sparks cling to the chassis for a couple of hops.
Aurora sparks clung to the bumper and softened the next stretch.

failure.outcome: The tollkeeper curses the bumper with a crackle.

effects.message: The aurora tollkeeper crackled at the bumper after the snub.

events.title: Time in Thunder Bay
events.summary: Time warped gently around Thunder Bay.

stages.text: Thunder Bay's skyline ripples; time itself offers a handshake.

choices.label: Go with it
choices.outcome: You let the hours flow backward around the van.

effects.message: Time credited a day back.
Let Thunder Bay bend time and gained a day and a splash of gas.

choices.label: Resist the pull
choices.outcome: You grip the wheel until the ripple passes.

effects.message: Resisted Thunder Bay's time ripple and kept the schedule steady.

choices.label: Exploit the loop
choices.outcome: You study every exit while the loop holds.

effects.label: Time loop sharpened the next preview.
effects.message: Time loop sharpened the next preview.
You memorized every neighboring route.
Exploited the Thunder Bay loop and charted every nearby route.
